pr_title: SAMZA-2517 : Adding handling and relevant exception message for null in oldest offset from system-admin

timeline.message: Adding handling and relevant exception message for null in oldest offset from system-admin

timeline.bodyText: This map seems redundant. Why not directly put to oldestOffsets?
timeline.author: bkonold

timeline.bodyText:
SystemStreamMetadata#getSystemStreamPartitionMetadata is also used in CoordinatorStreamStore, ContainerStorageManager and other places, we should also do null handling there right?
Isn't it better to do at StreamMetadataCache level?
timeline.author: Sanil15

replies.bodyText: the null values are on oldestOffset in the returned metadata-object not the returned objectl itself (returned val is by us and is not-null it appears).
replies.author: rmatharu

timeline.bodyText: What's the purpose for multiple ssps if they are each testing the same condition?
timeline.author: bkonold

replies.bodyText: the task-sideinputstoragemanager uses maps to index ssps so we should have more than 1, but youre right two are probably enough.
replies.author: rmatharu

timeline.author: bkonold
